But after her husband is found dead in his mistressÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bed, a devastated Cait leaves Chicago for the birthplace she hasnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t seen since she was a child. Graham Buchanan is a movie star with many secrets. A Gandiegow native, he frequently hides out in his hometown between films. He also has a son heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll do anything to protect. But Cait Macleod is too damn appealingÃ¢â‚¬â€even if she is a journalist.
